name: Bitdefender Antivirus Quarantine File
summary: Learn about .GZQUAR files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Bitdefender Antivirus Free Edition creates a GZQUAR file by appending the .gzquar extension to a dangerous file in order to prevent you from opening the file. You can view GZQUAR files quarantined by Bitdefender Antivirus Free Edition in the Quarantine section of the program and choose to restore or delete the files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
